title: Best of the Program | Guests: Clarence Henderson & Curtis Houck
description:
The final night of the RNC left America with a clear choice. Glenn issues an apology to President Trump for misjudging his character in 2016 and takes a look at the true message of his speech last night. Civil rights activist Clarence Henderson compares the current riots to the 1960s movement after a mob surrounded Sen. Rand Paul last night. NewsBusters managing editor Curtis Houck recaps the MSM meltdown over the RNC and the crowd at the White House. CNN reported that the Kenosha riots were “fiery, but mostly peaceful.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
